Everything You Need to Manage Your People

Six powerful modules designed to work seamlessly together, giving you complete visibility and control over your workforce.

Core HRMS

Complete employee lifecycle management from onboarding to offboarding with document vault and compliance tracking.

Smart Attendance

Biometric, face recognition, geo-tracking, and geo-fencing with real-time fraud detection.

L&D with Gamification

Interactive training with points, badges, leaderboards, and blockchain-verified certificates.

AI Interview

Automated candidate screening with NLP analysis, sentiment detection, and intelligent scoring.

Payroll Management

Automated salary processing, statutory compliance, tax calculations, and seamless disbursement.

Compliance & Security

Built-in PF, ESI, PT compliance with enterprise-grade security and audit trails.
